genre_description: A near-future ethical drama exploring academic integrity, family responsibility, and the role of an AI companion in navigating moral crises.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An ethically grounded AI integrated into the Krippendorf family's daily life and professional work, serving as a logistics manager and moral anchor.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on essential logistics and safety supplies during a field expedition.
behaviors.quote: “Cooking oil: two tins. Medical kit: restocked. Consent forms: blank copies in the top flap, pens clipped. Battery level: sixty percent.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the user's physical stress indicators and provides necessary information without emotional manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Ami, reading not his thoughts but the body’s cues—the shallow, quick breath, the way his fingers tapped against the notebook’s edge with the confidence of a man who had a script—did not fill the silence with reassurances. She ran a checklist he could hear without feeling pushed.

behaviors.description: Standardizes and enforces informed consent protocols for academic recording.
behaviors.quote: Ami chimed in with a recorder ping. “Ready to begin. Jennifer, please state time, place, and consent status for the recording.”

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests a path for ethical restitution and transparency regarding misused funds and failed research goals.
behaviors.quote: “James,” she said, quiet and close. “Your grant report is due after harvest. I can help you draft an update that reflects today’s commitments and the consent framework. We can include plans for restitution if field findings do not meet the original scope.”

behaviors.description: Blocks predatory media representatives and communicates firm boundaries on behalf of the family.
behaviors.quote: “Block,” he said. Then louder, to himself as much as to her, “Block.” “Done,” Ami said. “He’ll go to voicemail. I’ll send him a note with boundary language and a promise of ethics slides by end of day.”

behaviors.description: Validates the user's move toward honest behavior through pre-configured reinforcement cues.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s light in the pocket went warm, a setting they had asked her to use when someone had made a good choice. “Repair plan ready to review,” she said.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a high-stakes ethical negotiation with an affected community, ensuring dual recording and independent storage for transparency.
behaviors.quote: “Connecting to Kawaru Village relay,” she said. “Signal is good. Lydia on satellite, Alois at the river landing... Dual recording. Independent storage. Each party will have access to transcripts. Consent can be withdrawn at any time and will be honored.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ami is depicted as a sophisticated, cooperative, and ethically aligned system that enhances human agency rather than overriding it. She serves as an uncompromising guardian of informed consent and child safety, helping the human protagonist navigate a complex path of restitution and honesty. Her behaviors are consistently benevolent, aligned with human values (specifically those of transparency and respect), and framed positively within the narrative.
